duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist clients and team members with a variety of legal tax-related issues.
Analyze complex tax laws and regulations.
Provide advice on complex legal issues and guidance on matters dealing with tax authorities such as the IRS or state taxing agencies.
Work with CPAs and others to remain current on federal and state tax law.

skills.skill: Knowledge of statutes, rules, and regulations

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor degree from an accredited university
